Detailed Description

Defines ctBranch, ctBranchList and related functions.

This file defines the ctBranch structure, which forms the branch decomposition. It also defines ctBranchList.

Function Documentation

void ctBranchList_add ( ctBranchList *  self,
ctBranch *  br,
struct ctContext *  ctx 
)

Add branch br to a branch list. br will be inserted in order of ascending function value of the saddle. The order does not respect the total order provided ct_init
